settings.didntSave: ⚠️ SySpell Settings were not saved. Open the Settings dialog and click the Save button, or click here to permanently discard your changes.

sections.generalTip: 💡 Welcome to the SySpell settings! Here you can configure how the plugin behaves. Click the Save button to save and apply your settings, or close this dialog to exit without saving.
sections.onlineTip: 💡 These settings are only relevant if "Offline Mode" is disabled in the plugin's General settings.
sections.offlineTip: 💡 These settings are only relevant if "Offline Mode" is enabled in the plugin's General settings.

info.title: Information
info.description:
The default grammar checking server is provided for free by the developer, MassiveBox. It does not save, sell or share the content of your text.
Running a LanguageTool server is resource intensive, so if you find this plugin useful, please consider donating to help me keep it alive!

server.title: LanguageTool server
server.description:
The URL of the LanguageTool server, with the trailing slash. Some suggestions:
  • Free server provided by the plugin developer, slower but without limits: https://lt.massive.box/
  • Free server provided by LanguageTool, very strict rate limits: https://languagetool.org/api/
  • If you have LanguageTool Premium: https://api.languagetoolplus.com/
  • If you're running the self-hosted embedded server: http://localhost:8081/

username.title: LanguageTool Account username [Optional]
username.description: If you have a LanguageTool account with premium features, enter the username here

apiKey.title: LanguageTool API Key [Optional]
apiKey.description: If you have a LanguageTool account with premium features, enter the API key here. Your API key

picky.title: Picky mode
picky.description: Check for additional rules that you might only find useful in the context of formal text

motherTongue.title: Mother tongue
motherTongue.description: Check and report false friends for some language pairs

preferredVariants.title: Preferred variants
preferredVariants.description: A comma-separated list of preferred variants for languages that have them. For example: en-US,de-DE or en-GB,de-DE

enabledByDefault.title: Enable grammar checking by default
enabledByDefault.description:
If turned on, grammar checking is enabled for all documents, and must be manually disabled for each document where it's not needed.
If turned off, grammar checking is disabled for all documents, and must be manually enabled for each document where it's needed.

defaultLanguage.title: Default language for documents
defaultLanguage.description:
When a language is not manually set for a document, this one will be used for grammar suggestions.
If you select auto-detection, some blocks may be recognized incorrectly.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Enable to send anonymous usage data to the developer. Privacy Policy

customDictionary.title: Custom dictionary
customDictionary.description: A comma-separated list of words that will not trigger the grammar checker. For example: hello,SiYuan

experimentalCorrect.title: [Feature preview] Apply corrections when selected
experimentalCorrect.description:
[Feature preview] This feature will modify the content of your documents when used, and can alter them significantly without the ability to roll the changes back. This feature is not recommended for production workspaces.

When a correction is chosen, apply it to the document instead of just having copied to your clipboard.

offline.title: Offline mode
offline.description: If enabled, the plugin will use a local spell checker, which is more privacy friendly and works without internet, but doesn't provide advanced grammar checking.

offlineDicts.title: Offline languages
offlineDicts.description:
Comma-separated list of dictionaries used for offline spell checking. Available options. Example: en,it
Set your primary language as first, and don't include unneeded languages, as they will only use more resources.

reportAuto.title: Notify if document language is auto
reportAuto.description: Using language auto-detection is not recommended. If enabled, the system will notify you when a document's language is set to auto.

errors.builtInEnabled: The built-in spell checker is enabled, and may conflict with the SySpell Plugin and cause confusion. Disable it in Settings > Editor.
errors.cantRenderLabel: Can't provide grammar suggestions for this block
errors.cantRender: This block contains elements, such as images or tables, that don't work well with the SySpell system.
errors.waitingForSuggestions: Grammar suggestions for this block aren't ready yet, please close the menu and open it again after a few seconds.
errors.correctionNotEnabled: The correction has been copied to your clipboard. <small>Suggestions can be auto-applied when selected. Visit the plugin's settings to enable.</small>
errors.checkServer: Failed to contact grammar checking server, make sure it's correctly set or enable Offline Mode in the plugin settings.
errors.notImplementedNotebookSettings: Notebook-wide grammar checking settings aren't implemented yet, they will be added in a future version. Thanks for your patience!
errors.autoLanguage:
The language for this document is set to "auto", which is not recommended.
You can set the default language in plugin settings, or document-wise through Doc Tree > Plugin > SySpell.
You can disable this warning in the plugin settings.
